tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: All around amazing experience in this class. If you read the material, make your weekly forum posts, and do the few assignments, you will pass with flying colors. Extremely fair grading, workload, and expectations. He\'s also very interactive with interesting questions, comments, and assignments. Best classinstructor at Coastline, by a long shot!

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: The midterm was testing us on ch 1-12, but the class was only on ch 1-6! Why test us on chapters that we didnt go over as a class yet?? we finally go over ch 7-12 AFTER the midterm. pointless. he\'s a lazy professor who doesn\'t know how to teach. he just assigns work and gives credit. should have his Doctorate degree revoked.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: The class and the reading was interesting but the mid-term and final were so difficult that I barely passed, It was just too much information to retain,and with no review for either test that weighs so heavy on your grade, I don\'t think I would recommend this class as any (Introduction Sociology)just to In-depth.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: I took Dr. Washington\'s online class. While it is true that his participation points are as easy as writing and responding to weekly Discussion Boards and two 100 word article reviews, his tests were difficult and required reading 10 ch.\'s for a 2 hour test; that is next to impossible to memorize. DB\'s are thought provoking, interesting over all.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Absolutely the worst online class. Sounds easy, an article review, biweekly posting, midterm, and final. The midterm is extremely hard & not meant to test your knowledge, as expected, but to trip you up. Even though I expect an A in the class, I?d avoid this professor if at all possible.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Very interesting class, but in order to get an A, you basically need to have the textbook memorized!!! The exams were stressful, and I barely managed an A in the class. It would be very helpful if Prof. Washington put together a midterm/final study guides!

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: There is no review! Boring defeating class. Skip the disappointment.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Avoid his online class!Doesn\'t give an outline for the midterm or final. I read every chapter in the book and that still didnt help me get a great grade. Trying to remember 11 chapters of info for each exam is hard! I was an A student until I took this class.Do not waste your money or your time.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Did not enjoy this class at all. Grade is weekly online discussion participation and midterm and final. Way too much reading - no test reviews - very uninteresting.

comments: This teacher is great. im taking his online class and its super easy. He asks nothing but the minimum. I can be lazy sometimes but i still manage to have an A in his course .

comments: Stay away from this man! Please believe me in his class you are being set up for failure! He does not give any type of study guide for the midterm and final which is your whole grade.If he is your last opion for the semester TRUST ME, wait for the next semester and take someone, ANYONE else. tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Class Participation points and articles were totally easy. He sprang the whole midterm on us a week before we had it. It was very hard. It is open book and you get 2 hours. But man you need at least 3hrs. It covered more than half the book. He didn\'t even give a midterm review. Skip this teacher!

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: It was easy to get the participation points but when it came down to the midterm and especially the final it did NOT correspond to the reading. The tests are open book and the professor would tell us it would be from ch 9 to 18 (which is A LOT!) BUT the test would actually be from ch 1 to 22!! I thought it was unfair. Don\'t take him.
